channel.title: Drop items on death
channel.description:
I have a simple problem that I have no clue about. The guy I bought the source from said he has it on "Safe" mode when pking so you don't loose your items when you pk because it was in beta testing and he refuses to tell me how to change it if you have any clue I would appreciate it! It is a [PI] server by the way.
Contact me via skype - Myles.Frakes ~Thanks -RebelTexan
